long_description: The men's Oakley Flak Jacket Sunglasses answer the demands of active lifestyles with performance technology and a lightweight fit. Lightweight, stress-resistant O Matter(R) nylon frames provide durability and all-day comfort. Oakley's Three-Point Fit optimizes comfort and holds the lenses in precise optical alignment for superior clarity. Polycarbonate lenses cut glare, block 100% of harmful UV rays and are highly shatter- and impact-resistant. Wrap-around 8.75-base lens curvature optimizes peripheral vision and side protection. The semi-rimless design of the Oakley Flak Jacket Sunglasses means there's no frame rim to block downward view. Includes multiple interchangeable Unobtainium(R) nose pad options for a customizable and comfortable secure fit. Flak Jacket lets you change lenses in seconds to optimize vision in any sport environment; multiple lens colors are available through Oakley (additional lenses not included).
short_description: The men's Oakley Flak Jacket Sunglasses answer the demands of active lifestyles with performance technology and a lightweight fit.
